name: Moonlight
description: A ray of moonlight shines upon you, basking you in healing light. The user gains 2d12 + MOVE hit points. If this move is activated during the day, halve the total healing.
higherLevels: The dice roll for healing changes to 3d10 at level 5, 7d6 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Effectiveness varies depending on when it is used.
